data.title: TV Actors from Liverpool
data.meta_description: List of famous television actors/actresses who were born in Liverpool, with photos when available. These renowned LiverpudlianÂ actors and actresses are ...
data.text:
Voting Rules

Only TV actors who were born or grew up in Liverpool.

List of famous television actors/actresses who were born in Liverpool, with photos when available. These renowned Liverpudlian actors and actresses are listed by popularity, so the names at the top of the list will be the most recognizable. A few of these actors may not have technically been born in Liverpool, but everyone on this list grew up in Liverpool and considers it to be their home. This list includes Liverpool TV actors from every type of show, including cartoons where they might have done voice over work. If you grew up in Liverpool then you should be proud of these television actors whose birthplace is Liverpool. Various bits of information are available for these Liverpool celebrities as well, such as what year they were born and what shows they are known for. List ranges from Paul McCartney to John Lennon, plus much more.This list answers the questions, "Which TV actors are from Liverpool?" and "Who are the most famous Liverpool actors?"

Ranked by

The Walking Dead, Zero Hour, Sense and Sensibility

Birthplace : Everton, Liverpool, England, UK

Nationality : United Kingdom

An immensely talented actor, David Morrissey has made a name for himself in both television and film. He is best known for his roles in popular TV series such as The Walking Dead and The Missing. Morrissey's commanding presence on screen has earned him critical acclaim and a loyal fan following.

Highlander: The Series, Awake, Brotherhood

Birthplace : Liverpool, Merseyside, England, UK

Nationality : United Kingdom

With a career stretching over three decades, Jason Isaacs has showcased incredible versatility in his acting roles. Known for his portrayal of Lucius Malfoy in the Harry Potter series and Captain Gabriel Lorca in Star Trek: Discovery, Isaacs has become a household name. His acting skills have garnered him numerous awards and nominations, making him one of the most respected actors in the industry.

Doctor Who, Luther, Zero Hour

Birthplace : Liverpool, England, UK

Nationality : England

Beginning his career in the late 1980s, Paul McGann rose to prominence with his role in the cult classic Withnail and I. Later, he gained more recognition for his performance as the eighth Doctor Who in the 1996 TV movie. McGann's magnetic charisma and undeniable talent have allowed him to captivate audiences continuously.

Pride and Prejudice, Gavin & Stacey, Gavin and Stacey

Birthplace : Liverpool, England, UK

Nationality : United Kingdom

Combining wit and warmth, Alison Steadman has been captivating audiences for decades. The British actress is best known for her roles in Life is Sweet, Secrets & Lies, and the sitcom Gavin & Stacey. Steadman's exceptional talent comes through in both dramatic and comedic performances, earning her numerous accolades and recognition.

Sex and the City, My Boy Jack, Producing Parker

Birthplace : Liverpool, England, UK

Nationality : Canada, England

An international icon, Kim Cattrall gained worldwide fame for her iconic portrayal of Samantha Jones in the hit series Sex and the City. Beyond this legendary role, Cattrall has an extensive list of film and television credits that showcase her remarkable talent. She's also a stage actress, having performed on Broadway and London's West End.

Only Fools and Horses, All Change, Boys from the Blackstuff

Birthplace : United Kingdom

Nationality : United Kingdom

Renowned for his distinctive voice and acting abilities, Paul Barber has enjoyed a long and successful career in British film and television. Best known for his role as Denzil in the classic sitcom Only Fools and Horses, Barber has displayed an incredible range in his performances. His talent has earned him roles in productions such as The Full Monty and Toxteth Park.
